name: Mortimer, Dingo, Lotta & Felice
description:
Mortimer, Dingo, Lotta & Felice

Four people stuck in each their world need to help each other to find their way out.

Made as part of Nordic Game Jam Online

This game is played by 4 players.
The players need to be connected via voice chat.
Each player choose a unique character.

Help  each other - it's the only way.

Asset attributions can be found here.
